name: Wall protection
description:
Description:
Protect the kingdom wall. Summon mighty warriors!
Each type of warrior has its own characteristics, some attack from afar, some slow down, some heal.
Also in defense you will be helped by defensive structures that attack enemies.
Use cards with magic to reduce the number of enemies.
Be careful, the enemies are very dangerous. Some are divided into several enemies, some fire from afar, each of them wants to defeat you.

-Dynamic gameplay
-Crowds of enemies
-Interesting gameplay
